name: Avoid Modules with High Vocabulary Frequency (VOCF)  (FORTRAN)
description: This calculation is using the results of the calculated Halstead metrics n1, n2, N1 and N2. This diagnostic is a result of this calculation
rationale:
VOCF: Vocabulary Frequency corresponds to the average number of times the vocabulary is used (sum of distinct operands and operators) in a component. This metric is calculated as follows:
        VOCF = (N1+N2)/ (n1+n2)
 where:
        N1 is the number of operator occurrences,
        N2 is the number of operand occurrences,
        n1 is the number of distinct operators,
        n2 is the number of distinct operands
